idea: Hi, We are Consulting Firm who provides Health Score Card via Website
name: CFO Services LLP

idea:
We are a team of Sports and Exercise Science Specialist and Engineers working towards implementing Sports and Exercise Science in Indian Fitness Industry. We want to change the face of Indian fitness industry by making it a Organized sector. To contribute this we have started our Specialized courses based on Exercise Science for beginners and experts.
We are currently in traction stage and have a customer data base with ongoing two batches of different courses. We are further planning to set up a performance center and create a Web based solution for for general population. We have already started the work of personized workout app and programming application for users and trainers.
name: Health And Performance Science
